name: Harry James Potter

basic_info.address: Number Four Privet Drive, Little Whinging, Surrey
basic_info.title: Leader of Dumbledore's Army

objective: You are protected, in short, by your ability to love! The only protection that can possibly work against the lure of power like Voldemort's! In spite of all the temptation you have endured, all the suffering, you remain pure of heart, just as pure as you were at the age of eleven, when you stared into a mirror that reflected your heart's desire, and it showed you only the way to thwart Lord Voldemort, and not immortality or riches.

education.school: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
degrees: Master of Accounting, Projected Graduation Date: May 2016
